channel.description: Replace $YOURTIMEZONE with correct time zone and $YOURIFACE with network interface you want to scan. Network mode must be host. Set $DOCKERDATAPATH for container to save data: â€‹ sh docker run --name wyl \ -e "IFACES=$YOURIFACE" \ -e "TZ=$YOURTIMEZONE" \ --network="host" \ -v $DOCKERDATAPATH/wyl:/data/WatchYourLAN \ aceberg/watchyourlan Web GUI should be at http://localhost:8840
